value:
$WmMPID_花婿マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Wedding18,Face|This festival has been fun, but it
seems its end is upon us.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_Wedding18,Face|It all hinges on this final battle... The
bouquet toss!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ニニアン,ch03_16_Ninian_F_Wedding18,Face|Oh, I'm so sorry... It's not that I want
the Wedding Bouquet, but I promised
to help.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|I am Sanaki, the Apostle and 37th
Empress of Begnion. I will not lose to
you again! Prepare for battle!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|We did it! Victory is ours!$k$p$EFace|Wait here a moment, OK? I'm going
to fetch my friend so she can accept
the Wedding Bouquet.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Just who is this friend, anyway?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|One of the Heroes. She's in love with
someone and she wants the bouquet
for luck. So I told her I'd help her out!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Ohh, I love it! Who's the Hero, huh?
It must be someone summoned by
$Nu...$k$pDish out the details!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Sorry, Commander, but I've been
sworn to secrecy!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|As your commander, I could order
you to tell me... But, I guess all is fair
in love and war.$k$pAnd here I was, thinking this whole
time you wanted the bouquet for you
and $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|M-m-me and... Me and
$Nu?$k$pNo, you're wrong! Where'd you get
that idea? Anyway, it's way too early
for me to be thinking about marriage!$k$pI'm going to go get my friend!$k$p$Sbs150|
